issue.title: Download data log result to external repository (firebase / others)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13935](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13935). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We are seeing logs like this:

{"message": "API rate limit exceeded for 185.166.253.47. (But here's the good news: Authenticated requests get a higher rate limit. Check out the documentation for more details.)","documentation_url": "<https://docs.github.com/rest/overview/resources-in-the-rest-api#rate-limiting>"}

 

Try to download once time per day all data needed and then query this external repository for log results

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13935?focusedCommentId=17417803) by David Dali Susanibar Arce (dsusanibara):*
We decided to use firebase realtime database
